articles.title: Vogue's AI model reignites beauty standards and inclusivity debate
articles.author: Kausar Madhyia
articles.summary: Guess featured an AI model in Vogue's August issue, sparking debate. Lenskart introduced its 'K-Pop Collection by Lenskart Studio' with a virtual K-Pop band named Astro IRIS. Seematti launched Isha Ravi, an AI-generated model, as its fashion ambassador.

articles.title: Can Frost Play Fast? I UCF Podcast
articles.summary: WeAreIowa offers its streaming service through the WeAreIowa app, accessible on phones.

articles.title: If Your Beauty Routine Needs A Glow Up, Try These 36 Reviewer-Beloved Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies have launched or updated beauty and skincare products. Lumify Eye Drops is a popular redness reducer, while Gold Bond released a firming neck and chest cream. Other product releases and updates include Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder, La Roche-Posay's Anthelios SPF 40 Tinted Sunscreen, and E.l.f's Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, which highlights a new mascara formulation and its easy removal.

articles.title: Hog Roundup with Jacob Morris
articles.author: Jacob Morris
articles.summary: Amazon curates its hottest new products on its 'new releases' page, showcasing items that have gone on sale within the last seven days.

articles.title: The Sudsy Challenge: try wearing the same outfit for three days in September
articles.author: Lucas Patchett
articles.summary: Orange Sky Laundry is promoting 'The Sudsy Challenge,' a campaign to raise awareness about homelessness. Participants wear the same outfit for three days to spark conversations and raise funds to support Orange Sky's mobile laundry services for people experiencing homelessness. The challenge aims to highlight the lack of access to clean clothes for many Australians.

articles.title: Ticker: Starbucks looks to protein drinks; China and US may work to extend latest tariff deadline
articles.author: Boston Herald
articles.summary: Starbucks plans to launch new products next year to boost U.S. sales. These new offerings include a cold foam protein drink, coconut water-based beverages, and improved baked goods.

articles.title: 32 Cleaning Products If You Make Colossal Messes
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new cleaning and organizational products designed to simplify household tasks. Featured items include stain removers, appliance cleaners like Bissell Little Green machine and Roomba robot vacuum, and organizers, all aimed at efficiency and convenience. Also, it presents EasyWring microfiber spin mop for floor cleaning.

articles.title: Restaurant to be first in SF to offer cell-grown salmon
articles.author: San Francisco Examiner
articles.summary: An omakase restaurant in The City will be the first to offer a cultured-cell salmon product. The salmon product was developed by a local startup.

articles.title: This $5 Aldi Product Will Completely Upgrade Your Breakfast Sandwiches
articles.author: Olivia Bria
articles.summary: Aldi is offering the Crofton Egg & Bacon Sandwich Maker for $5, a device for creating muffin-style breakfast sandwiches at home using a microwave. Alternatively, customers are also purchasing the Drew & Cole Breakfast Sandwich Maker for $25, another product designed to replicate egg muffins, featuring a bread slot.

articles.title: New Balance's $100 997R Sneakers Are Just $50 Right Now
articles.author: Kelsey Mccarson
articles.summary: Zappos is offering a 50% discount on New Balance 997R sneakers, selling them for $50 (originally $100). The sale is on the Raincloud/White/Faded Plum colorway, with sizes ranging from men's 5.5 to 11 and women's 7 to 13.5. Zappos notes this is the lowest price in 30 days.

articles.title: A Deep Cut Deal: Save $300 Off a Surface Laptop
articles.author: George Yang
articles.summary: Microsoft's 7th edition Surface laptop, featuring a Snapdragon X Plus processor, is now available at Newegg with a 25% discount. The laptop boasts enhanced AI capabilities for creative tasks and extended battery life, with an all-day battery life providing up to 20 hours of video playback. It leverages AI in creative ways, such as enhancing Adobe Lightroom's editing tools to remove obstacles and add special effects, as well as seamlessly pairs the HD Surface studio camera with Windows Studio Effects

articles.title: Flex Mobile Launches First-Ever Premium Membership Model in Prepaid Wireless
articles.author: Flex Mobile
articles.summary: Flex Mobile launched its premium membership experience for prepaid wireless customers. This new service introduces a customer rewards program that transforms a basic phone plan into a monthly membership with perks like travel discounts, entertainment deals, and personalized support.

articles.title: How China's ‘virtual humans' reshape cross-border e-commerce
articles.author: Chen Qingrui
articles.summary: Yiwu International Trade City launched the world's first large language model tailored to commodity trade to help merchants connect with global customers, leading to a 20% increase in merchant orders. Zhongguancun Kejin Technology Co's AI system handles 80% of standardized inquiries, including product introductions, at a quarter of the cost of human customer service. iFLYTEK's Spark X1 now supports over 130 languages, with voice recognition in 100 languages.

articles.title: Starbucks looks to protein drinks and other new products to turn around lagging US sales next year
articles.author: Standard-Speaker
articles.summary: Starbucks expressed confidence regarding the introduction of new products in the upcoming year.

articles.title: Reliance Jio Launches AI-Ready Cloud Computer JioPC for India
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Reliance Jio launched JioPC, a cloud-based virtual desktop platform in India. JioPC offers on-demand computing with subscription plans starting at Rs 400 per month and includes features like AI-ready tools, Jio Workspace, Microsoft Office (browser), and 512 GB cloud storage.

articles.title: General Mills adds Totino's Ultimate Pizza
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A new product is available in three different varieties.

articles.title: Zego, CIVC acquire certain Montana Gluten Free assets
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Zego acquired a gluten-free processor. This acquisition creates a new venture for Zego, likely expanding its product offerings in the gluten-free market.

articles.title: Micron Unveils Portfolio of Industry-First SSDs to Power the AI Revolution  Jul. 29, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: Micron Technology launched three new data center SSDs: the 9650 (PCIe Gen6), the 6600 ION (E3.S 122TB), and the 7600 (PCIe Gen5). The 9650 SSD delivers twice the performance of competitive drives, the 6600 ION SSD increases storage density up to 67%, and the 7600 SSD offers superior PCIe Gen5 performance. Samples of the 9650 and 7600 SSDs are shipping now, while the 6600 ION 122TB SSD samples will ship later in Q3 2025.

articles.title: Starbucks looks to protein drinks and other new products to turn around lagging US sales next year
articles.author: Associated Press
articles.summary: Companies introduce new products: a cold foam protein drink and coconut water-based beverages.

articles.title: DJI's first robot vacuum is being announced on August 6th.
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: DJI will announce its first robot vacuum on August 6th. The vacuum will utilize a dock.

articles.title: Summer & Fall's Top Body Deodorants
articles.summary: Shea Moisture has launched a Whole Body Deodorant Spray featuring raw shea butter. The product provides long-lasting odor protection and moisturizes the skin. The article also highlights various deodorants from brands like Native, Degree, Old Spice, Secret, Schmidt's, Dove, and Tom's of Maine, suitable for different seasons and skin types.

articles.title: Python1.com
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: AMD offers high-performance Ryzen dedicated servers designed for unmatched performance, security, and control. These servers aim to unlock the full potential of online presence.

articles.title: 2026 Nissan Rogue priced from $28,790, adds striking new Dark Armor grade
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nissan is launching the 2026 Nissan Rogue, which features advanced technology, updated style, and versatility. The updated lineup includes a Rock Creek version and a new Dark Armor grade.

articles.title: Former Vizrt Execs Launch AI-Driven Media Production Company
articles.author: Tom Butts
articles.summary: Emergent designed a new service to facilitate AI adoption and implementation for creators.

articles.title: eToro to launch tokenized U.S. stocks on Ethereum
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: eToro has expanded its product offerings. eToro launched tokenized stocks.

articles.title: Former CapCut China Head Launches Lovart AI Design Tool
articles.author: Andrew Dubbs
articles.summary: Lovart, a new AI design tool, has been launched by a team including the former China head of CapCut. The tool aims to provide AI-powered design solutions and enters a competitive market of AI design tools. It may offer strengths in motion graphics or video-related design elements.

articles.title: Quick Nordstrom shopping: This Sulwhasoo serum duo won't stay in stock long
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Sulwhasoo's First Care Activating Serum VI Duo, containing ginseng extract and JAUM Activator, is highlighted for its hydrating, redness-reducing, and radiance-boosting properties. The serum is available as a limited-edition offering in the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale until August 4, providing a value-packed opportunity to acquire two bottles.

articles.title: Victoria Beckham Beauty launches 'stunning' blush in three shades
articles.summary: Victoria Beckham Beauty has launched the Colour Wash Blush Water Tint, a water-based blush available in three shades. This blush is formulated with mineralized sea water and coconut fruit water, designed to detoxify and energize the skin. Available for £44, the product promises a natural glow and is packaged in a 6ml bottle with a dropper applicator.

articles.title: Google Chrome will display artificial intelligence ratings of online stores
articles.author: Mektrin Motors
articles.summary: Google launched a new AI-powered feature that displays online store reviews to enhance shopping safety and efficiency. This feature analyzes user reviews from various partners. Additionally, Google is developing personalized product recommendations and improved price tracking tools, further integrating AI into the shopping experience.

articles.title: SAMYANG FOODS UNVEILS MEP, A NEW SPICY NOODLE SOUP BRAND THAT'S FOOD FOR THE SOUL
articles.author: Samyang Foods USA
articles.summary: Samyang Foods is launching MEP, a new ramyeon product, in the U.S. market. MEP aims to provide consumers with a comfortable and spicy instant noodle soup experience.

articles.title: Target Hoover SmartWash is praised for tackling tough carpet stains and now $80 off with free shipping
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Target is offering the Hoover SmartWash Automatic Carpet Cleaner Machine at a discounted price of $199.99, reduced from $279.99, with free shipping. The Hoover SmartWash features Automatic Cleaning Technology and Auto Dry with HeatForce, simplifying carpet cleaning. BISSELL Little Green Portable Carpet Cleaner and BISSELL CrossWave All-in-One Multi Surface Wet Dry Vacuum are alternatives also being offered by Target.

articles.title: Business unusual: What happens when AI joins your workforce
articles.author: Olufemi Oluoje Kazeem
articles.summary: AI agents are being introduced as digital workers for businesses in Nigeria. These AI tools are providing new levels of automation and intelligence in customer service by answering calls, assisting in decision-making by analyzing sales data, personalizing marketing, predicting machine failures in manufacturing, assisting doctors, managing finances, aiding legal compliance, and providing customized staff training. By the end of 2025, the article predicts that they will be more common than POS machines in the corner shop.

articles.title: What happens when AI joins your workforce
articles.author: Olufemi Oluoje Kazeem
articles.summary: AI is being introduced as a service in Nigerian businesses. This includes AI-powered customer service with 24/7 availability and multilingual support, AI's support for decision-making through trend analysis, and smarter, targeted marketing strategies. Furthermore, AI will assist factories in monitoring machines and predicting failures, reducing downtime, while AI will also serve as support within hospitals, assisting with diagnoses and record keeping.

articles.title: This electric spin scrubber is nearly 90% off on Amazon Canada — yes, seriously!
articles.author: Yahoo Canada Shopping Editors
articles.summary: The Electric Spin Scrubber, featuring detachable brushes and a powerful motor with two speeds, is available on Amazon Canada. With an extendable handle, 90-minute runtime, and IPX7 waterproof rating, the scrubber is described as a game-changer for deep cleaning by some shoppers, though others suggest it may lack sufficient power for intense cleaning tasks.

articles.title: Nando's next Houston location is 'cheekiest' yet, right inside Montrose
articles.author: John-Henry Perera
articles.summary: Nando's Peri-Peri Chicken is opening a new restaurant at 1201 Westheimer Rd. in Houston on Tuesday. The 3,538-square-foot restaurant will offer its signature fire-grilled South African chicken, marinated for 24 hours in a signature spice blend.

articles.title: Driving impressions: why the Suzuki Swift deserves its crown as the top hatchback
articles.author: Willem van de Putte
articles.summary: The Suzuki Swift features Suzuki's new 1.2-litre three-cylinder engine delivering 60kW and 112NM of torque. The flagship 1.2 GLX model is priced at R271 900 and comes with a seven-inch touchscreen infotainment system compatible with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto. It also includes safety features like six airbags, ABS brakes with EBD, and Electronic Stability Programme.

articles.title: Birdelo: The First All-in-One PR Platform for Brands and Media, Trusted Since 2008 -- Now Relaunches with AI, a Full Marketplace, and a Bird with Opinions
articles.author: Birdelo
articles.summary: Birdelo, a PR platform, is relaunching with a 2.0 upgrade. This upgrade includes the addition of a powerful AI search feature and a growing marketplace featuring thousands of products, alongside a more intuitive media-first experience.

articles.title: New details on NYC shooting rampage suspect
articles.author: CBS News
articles.summary: Apple is preparing to launch the iPhone 16 in September. The new iPhone 16 will feature a 48MP main lens camera with improved low-light performance, titanium casing, and a faster A18 chip.

articles.title: PowerPoint Download Guide: The Fastest Way to Start Creating Stunning Presentations
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: WPS Presentation is introduced as a free, lightweight alternative to Microsoft PowerPoint, offering a familiar interface and compatibility with .ppt/.pptx files. It provides a range of templates and works across multiple devices, making it suitable for students, freelancers, and small business owners who want to create presentations without a Microsoft 365 subscription.

articles.title: Luxury vodka arriving in Portugal
articles.summary: Spy X, an ultra-luxury vodka brand, launched in Portugal on July 21st. Distilled and bottled in Poland using a secret blend of spelt and wheat, the vodka aims for a smooth and ultra-neutral character. The launch event featured signature cocktails and showcased the brand's elegance and connection to mystery and luxury.

articles.title: The 'Holy Grail Of Dish Soaps' Is On Rare Sale For Less Than $15 Right Now
articles.author: Erica Kam
articles.summary: Dawn is offering its Platinum Plus Powerwash dish spray, known for its spray mechanism and grease-removing capabilities, at a discounted price on Amazon. This product, available in scents like apple, simplifies dishwashing and can be used for various cleaning tasks. User reviews praise its effectiveness and versatility.

articles.title: This pasta has TWO times the protein, no gluten and Tom Brady's seal of approval - and it's already going viral
articles.author: JULIA REMILLARD
articles.summary: Banza, known for its chickpea pasta, has launched a new line of chickpea-enhanced Brown Rice Pasta. This gluten-free pasta alternative comes in four varieties: Penne, Rotini, Elbows, and Spaghetti and is available for $3.99 a box at select retailers like Whole Foods and Target, as well as online.

articles.title: Walmart Has the Ninja Creami Ice Cream Maker on Sale for $169—It's the Lowest Price We've Seen Online
articles.author: Cameron Le Blanc
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the Ninja Creami Ice Cream Maker for $169, a 15% discount from its normal price. The Ninja Creami can transform various ingredients into frozen desserts. It allows users to create diverse recipes from protein shakes to coffee milkshakes.

articles.title: Listing of new Commercial Paper of Balrampur Chini Mills Ltd. (BSE Ltd)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Balrampur Chini Mills Ltd. is listing a new Commercial Paper. The Exchange has informed Trading Members about this new listing.

articles.title: Best convertible vacuum cleaners with multiple attachments for every home: Top picks on Amazon
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: AGARO offers Regal and Regal Plus convertible vacuum cleaners with varying power and suction capabilities. Eureka Forbes presents a compact 700W vacuum cleaner. Tineco introduces the S5 Combo cordless wet & dry vacuum cleaner, while DREAME launches the K10 Pro wet dry vacuum cleaner. AMERICAN MICRONIC features a 1600W wet & dry vacuum cleaner, BISSELL promotes the CrossWave HF2 for hard floors, and Laresar presents the Ultra 7 cordless vacuum cleaner.

articles.title: First 100 Days in Product Ops: A Practical Playbook
articles.summary: Bagel AI helps product ops teams unify workflows and drive high-impact decisions by integrating with tools like Salesforce, Zendesk, Gong, and Jira. This integration allows product teams to surface revenue-impacting feedback, detect patterns in customer pain, and validate roadmap priorities, ultimately improving the quality and speed of decision-making.

articles.title: Marketing Trends 2025: SEO and AI Go Hand in Hand
articles.summary: Synatix plans to launch its predictive bidding system as a SaaS product in 2025. This system uses proprietary AI models to automate campaign optimization by dynamically adjusting budgets and bidding strategies based on conversion signals from web and app analytics. The company aims to provide industry-leading technologies for performance marketing by implementing this AI automation.

articles.title: LG Unveils Exclusive Summer Savings to Elevate Every Moment of the Season
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: LG Electronics launched its summer campaign in the UAE. The campaign includes a series of limited-time offers.

articles.title: SEO specialist fatjoe launches new ‘Brand Mentions' service
articles.summary: fatjoe has launched its new 'Brand Mentions' service for marketers, agencies, and SEO teams to boost brand visibility and authority through high-quality content. The service focuses on AI SEO and is delivered through listicle or review articles published on high-domain-rating websites. The service is available in three packages and can integrate with fatjoe's other services.

articles.title: New Samsung Galaxy arrives today and ultimate test proves it's tough to beat
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7 in the UK, featuring an improved rear camera, faster Qualcomm processor, and a wider front screen. The phone's new design addresses thickness issues, and pre-order customers can receive double storage for free. Samsung also offers three months of Accidental Damage cover and a 100-day trial period.

articles.title: Home Bargains £3.99 household hack is like having a new wardrobe
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Home Bargains introduces a £3.99 battery-operated lint remover designed to eliminate lint and fuzz from soft materials, revitalizing worn-out clothes and upholstery. The device features a built-in lint collection chamber and offers a cost-effective solution to refresh garments, potentially saving money by avoiding replacements.

articles.title: ThoughtSpot Redefines AI Interoperability with Launch of ThoughtSpot Agentic MCP Server
articles.summary: ThoughtSpot has launched its Agentic Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server, enabling businesses to integrate ThoughtSpot's agentic analytics into AI agents, platforms, and interfaces. The Agentic MCP Server includes integrations with platforms such as Claude, Gemini, and ChatGPT, allowing users to gain instant access to actionable insights within their existing workflows.

articles.title: Walmart tells shopper to ‘skip' coming to their store after parking lot trouble – but does offer alternative
articles.author: James Evenden
articles.summary: Walmart offers Walmart+ membership with perks like free delivery, including pharmacy items and same-day prescription delivery with no minimum fee. Walmart has also entered into an exclusive deal with Vizio, making Walmart the only retailer to sell Vizio products after December 2024.

articles.title: 33 Products You'll Never Want To Live Without
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: Cushionaire offers cork-bottom sandals with a similar design to Mayari Birks. Owala introduces the FreeSip tumbler which keeps drinks cold and allows you to drink with or without a straw. Sol De Janeiro promotes Bum Bum Cream to tighten skin with caffeine and guaraná extract formula.

articles.title: What is Google's AI Mode? How to use new tool in UK
articles.author: Molly Court
articles.summary: Google is launching 'AI Mode' in Google Search for UK users. This new feature expands on AI Overviews and provides a conversational, chat-like interface powered by Google's Gemini 2.5 model, allowing users to ask complex questions and receive in-depth breakdowns of search queries.

articles.title: EssayHub and Student Success: A Closer Examination
articles.author: Sponsored Content
articles.summary: EssayHub provides custom essays, editing, and proofreading services aimed at enhancing students' academic performance across various levels of education. The company positions itself as a comprehensive educational resource offering learning assistance and time management solutions, sometimes attracting new users through promotional codes.

articles.title: AI+ Nova 5G Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: AI+ officially announced the Nova 5G smartphone in the third quarter of 2025. The 5G-ready smartphone features a Li-Po 5000 mAh battery with 18W wired charging, a 6.75-inch IPS TFT display, and a dual-camera setup with a 50MP main sensor. It is powered by a Unisoc Tanggula T765 UMS9621 T8200 Octa-core processor and runs on Android 15.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord CE 5 review: Long battery life, clean design make it a reliable phone
articles.author: Karan Mahadik
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the Nord CE 5 smartphone, focusing on battery life, performance, and software support. The phone features a 6.77-inch AMOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Apex chip, a 7100mAh battery with 80W SuperVOOC charging, and a 50MP main camera with OIS. It runs on Oxygen OS 15 based on Android 15 and includes AI features.

articles.title: Best Web Development Service Provider
articles.summary: Eazztree, a leading IT solutions company, offers web development, mobile app development, UI/UX design, cloud computing, AI & machine learning, and digital marketing services. The company focuses on innovation and client satisfaction, providing scalable tech solutions for business growth.

articles.title: 38 Things With Thousands Of 5-Star Ratings If You Trust Reviewers More Than TikTok Influencers
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Revlon introduced a hot air brush for creating blowout-level looks. Arm & Hammer launched dog wipes with glycerin, aloe, and oat extract. Good Molecules released Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel which helps minimize eye puffiness and swelling.

articles.title: Reliance Jio Announces India's First AI-ready Cloud Computer
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Reliance Jio has launched JioPC, a cloud-based virtual desktop platform. The JioPC offers on-demand computing with AI-ready tools. JioPC subscriptions start at Rs 400 per month and include access to Adobe Express and 512 GB of cloud storage. It is available to all existing and new JioFiber and Jio AirFiber customers across the country. New users can access the service for free for one month.

articles.title: Sutherland Announces Enterprise-Ready Agentic AI Delivering Real-World Business Outcomes
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Sutherland launched its 'Agentic AI' solutions, designed to enhance operations by combining human expertise with intelligent automation. A global streaming platform uses Sutherland's Agentic AI to improve customer interactions and a U.S. telecom provider employs it for data protection and regulatory compliance. The platform provides real-time support and data analysis.

articles.title: Procter & Gamble hikes US prices amid tariff challenges, CEO change
articles.author: Jessica Di Napoli
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble is increasing prices on approximately 25% of its U.S. products and finds consumer demand for new products like Tide Evo is strong. These measures aim to offset tariff costs.

articles.title: Thermon(R) Introduces Poseidon(TM) and Pontus(TM) Liquid Load Banks: Revolutionizing Data Center Commissioning and Validation
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Thermon Group Holdings, Inc. has announced the universal availability of their new Poseidon™ Liquid Load Bank (for US markets) and Pontus™ Liquid Load Bank (for non-US markets). These advanced systems simulate real-world thermal and electrical demand, providing mission-critical component test validation for data centers and other High-Performance Computing environments. The load banks serve as essential test validation systems for critical HPC data center infrastructure.

articles.title: Meltwater Debuts Industry-First GenAI Lens, Unlocking Enhanced Brand Insights
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Meltwater launched GenAI Lens on July 29, 2025, a tool providing companies visibility into brand, competitor, and industry discussions across major AI assistants and LLMs. GenAI Lens addresses the challenge of monitoring brand perception as generative AI increasingly shapes content creation and news cycles.

articles.title: Signage plans for Yate Aldi submitted at old Cineworld site
articles.author: Alice Knight
articles.summary: Aldi plans to open a new supermarket at Riverside Retail Park in Yate, with proposed opening hours from 8am to 10pm, Monday to Saturday, and from 10am to 4pm on Sundays. The store is expected to create up to 40 full-time jobs and is set to join other brands like KFC, Puregym, and TK Maxx.

articles.title: Insta360 Just Launched a Drone Brand to Take Down DJI
articles.summary: Insta360, known for action cams, launched a new brand of consumer drones with 360-degree cameras, directly competing with DJI. This launch represents Insta360's expansion into the consumer drone market, following previous successful entries into other industries. The new drones aim to simplify aerial videography.

articles.title: Here's how you can save over £1000 on the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Vodafone is offering a deal on the new Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 phones, allowing customers to save up to £1032 through trade-ins. The deal includes monthly discounts, flexible payment plans, and Vodafone's Lifetime Service Promise. The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 is available from £54 a month, the Z Flip 7 from £27 a month, and the Flip 7 FE from £21.50 a month.

articles.title: Google launches controversial ‘AI mode' in the UK
articles.author: Andrew Griffin
articles.summary: Google is launching its AI tool, AI Mode, in the UK, following its previous launch in the US and India. Powered by Gemini 2.5, AI Mode allows users to ask complex questions and receive AI-generated answers, accessible via a tab on Google Search and the Google app. The tool is designed for exploratory questions and complicated tasks and represents a 'major shift' in how people use online searches.

articles.title: AI+ Pulse Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: AI+ officially announced the AI+ Pulse in Q3 2025, a budget smartphone featuring a 5000 mAh battery with 10W wired charging. The phone has options for 4GB or 6GB RAM and 64GB or 128GB of internal storage. It also features a dual-camera setup with a 50-megapixel main sensor and runs on Android 15.

articles.title: 800,000 EVs and Counting: NIO's New Onbo L90 Is Its Most Practical Yet
articles.author: Daniel Thompson
articles.summary: NIO has launched the Onbo L90, a family-oriented three-row SUV, with pre-orders starting July 10th and an official launch on July 31st. The Onbo L90 is priced at 279,900 CNY, with an innovative Battery as a Service (BaaS) option reducing the entry price to 193,900 CNY.

articles.title: LG Unveils Exclusive Summer Savings to Elevate Every Moment of the Season
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched its summer campaign in the UAE, offering discounts on various products, including up to 25% off on select home appliances such as the LG Black Glass InstaView Door-in-Door refrigerator and LG WashTower. Furthermore, LG's Dehumidifier is available at a promotional price and customers can enjoy discounts of up to 30% on LG's OLED and QNED TVs, as well as 20% off on the LG CineBeam Q Small 4K UHD Projector.

articles.title: Kraft Mac & Cheese Gets New Flavor Inspired by Another 'Iconic' Comfort Food
articles.author: Marisa Losciale
articles.summary: Kraft Mac & Cheese has launched a new limited-edition pizza-flavored mac & cheese, featuring garlic and Italian spices. Kraft partnered with GoPuff for a special pizza-style delivery of the new flavor, starting August 1. The new flavor is available at major retailers, including Walmart.

articles.title: Kraft Mac & Cheese Gets New Flavor Inspired by Another 'Iconic' Comfort Food
articles.author: Parade
articles.summary: Kraft Mac & Cheese has launched a new pizza-flavored mac & cheese, a limited-edition flavor combining garlic and Italian spices with creamy, cheesy Kraft Mac & Cheese. To promote the launch, Kraft partnered with GoPuff to offer a special pizza-style delivery of the new flavor, available starting August 1st. The new flavor is officially available at major retailers nationwide, including Walmart.

articles.title: Avoid these projector features like the plague
articles.author: Anthony Marcusa
articles.summary: Samsung's projector offers an immersive experience with at least FHD (1080p) resolution for quality images. The projector market includes models with smart systems, which allow users to access various apps and streaming services. It is important to make sure that the smart projector runs on a popular, trusted, and certified operating system.

articles.title: Insta360's Antigravity challenges DJI with 8K 360-degree drone
articles.author: Coco Feng
articles.summary: Antigravity, a new brand from Insta360, is launching its first product: a sub-249 gram drone featuring a built-in 360-degree camera with 8K resolution. The drone supports real-time data transmission and allows users to adjust shooting parameters during flights. It aims to cater to both experts and beginners.

articles.title: How AI Is Changing Marketing Communications
articles.author: Kurt Allen
articles.summary: Notre Dame de Namur University (NDNU) is exploring AI to support content ideation, student engagement, and personalized messaging. For student recruitment campaigns, NDNU uses AI-generated copy to test multiple message variations quickly, combined with dynamic creative optimization (DCO) technologies to deliver multiple ad versions that speak directly to unique prospects' motivations.

articles.title: LG Electronics steps up AI shift with CEO-led push
articles.author: 용산막둥이 부동산 돋보기
articles.summary: LG Electronics is implementing its AI transformation (AX) initiative and using its generative AI-powered data analysis system, CHATDA, to improve product development and features. For example, in India, LG added freshness and hygiene features to refrigerators based on CHATDA's analysis of climate data. Similarly, in Brazil, LG enhanced the user experience of washing machines by reordering functions based on user preferences for smaller loads.

articles.title: Meltwater Launches GenAI Lens for Brand Insights
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: Meltwater launched GenAI Lens, a new tool that provides companies with visibility into how their brand, competitors, and industry are discussed across AI Assistants and LLMs like ChatGPT and Gemini. The GenAI Lens monitors and analyzes responses from GenAI tools, helping brands track mentions, detect reputational risks, and refine communication strategies.

articles.title: Inside the collapse of Builder.ai: Was it even an AI company?
articles.author: Varsha Bansal
articles.summary: Builder.ai launched 'Natasha,' an AI chatbot, promoted as the 'world's first AI-powered product manager,' to streamline app and website development. Builder.ai claimed Natasha could automate much of the building process and interact with customers to translate ideas into features, set timelines, and calculate budgets. The platform aimed to simplify software creation by utilizing pre-coded building blocks and AI, promising faster and cheaper app development.

articles.title: Tired of slow servers? 🚀⚡️ For real virtual server performance, switch to vibyte.net! ⚡️
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: Vibyte.net has launched a new VDS service that promises high performance and speed. The service offers real customer support and instant setup, addressing common issues like overloaded resources and long waiting times.

articles.title: AI mode search launched in the UK: Google rolls out new smart search features
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Google launched its AI Mode search experience in the UK and India. This new feature, powered by the Gemini 2.5 model, provides users with AI-powered overviews, faster summaries, and a conversational search experience. Users can now ask complex questions and receive detailed AI-generated answers with relevant links.

articles.title: 삼성전자, AI TV ‘클릭 투 서치' 소비자 체험 이벤트
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is holding a consumer experience event for its 2025 AI TVs until August 31st. The event showcases the 'Click to Search' feature powered by Bixby, allowing users to retrieve information related to viewed content or request daily life information via voice commands. Participants have the chance to win prizes, including a 77-inch Samsung OLED (SF95) TV.

articles.title: Give your old Kindle to Amazon and you'll get something much better for less
articles.author: Dave Snelling
articles.summary: Amazon has launched two new Kindle e-readers: the Kindle Colorsoft, priced at £239.99, and the Amazon Kindle Colorsoft Kids, priced at £259. The Kindle Colorsoft offers 16GB of storage, adjustable warm light, and access to the Kindle bookstore, while the Kindle Colorsoft Kids includes 12 months of Amazon Kids+, a kid-friendly cover, and a 2-year guarantee.

articles.title: LG Revolutionizes Workplace Flexibility With Launch of Smart Monitor Swing in Gulf Region
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: LG Electronics launched a new product in the Gulf region. This introduction represents a significant addition to the region's technology landscape.

articles.title: OPPO Unveils Reno14 AI Phone and Smart After-Sales Service System
articles.author: OPPO
articles.summary: OPPO launched an upgraded after-sales service system powered by its proprietary AndesGPT large language model. This system integrates AI into customer service, offering multilingual interactions, personalized solutions, and AI assistant capabilities. The system is localized across 20 countries and regions, providing 24/7 service in 13 languages, enhancing customer service efficiency and user experience.

articles.title: Next £45 jeans reduced to £18 in clearance sale 'look and feel amazing on'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Next has reduced the price of their Dart Detail Barrel 100% Cotton Jeans from £45 to £18 in a clearance sale. These jeans feature a barrel-leg shape and have received positive customer reviews, with an average rating of 4.5 stars out of five.

articles.title: 31 Solutions To Dark Spots, Bumps, Fungus, And Other Human Issues We All Grapple With
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Several companies are launching or promoting new beauty, personal care, and health products. Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream. Mielle is promoting its Rosemary Mint strengthening oil. Anua is promoting their Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil.

articles.title: Humane AI pin was a flop… so I used the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 as an AI device in my jeans pocket
articles.author: Nandagopal Rajan
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 has a thinner design and a more robust hinge mechanism. The cover display has been improved and is now an edge-to-edge display. The phone offers AI capabilities that can be used without flipping it open.

articles.title: World's first robot 6S store opens in south China's Shenzhen
org: Shenzhen Future Times Robotics Co., Ltd
Shenzhen Longgang District Artificial Intelligence (Robotics) Administration
articles.summary: Shenzhen Future Times Robotics Co., Ltd. opened a robot 6S store that introduces new services such as on-demand leasing and fully customized robot products. The store aims to redefine service standards and facilitate the transition of robots from lab to market, helping transform technical concepts into real-life applications. Over 200 companies have expressed interest in joining the store's services.

articles.title: Tokyo-Based byZOO Integrates AI to Mirror Human Consciousness and Tap Into the Zero Point Field
articles.summary: byZOO Corp., known for 'b わたしの英会話', has launched an initiative exploring AI's use as a 'mirror of consciousness' to connect with the Zero Point Field (ZPF).  They integrated the 'ZPF Console' into organizational processes. The company emphasizes language as a gateway to self-discovery and empowerment.

articles.title: Trump's Online Strategy: A Shift Away From "Made in USA" Messaging
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Trump Mobile has entered the telecommunications market with plans around $50 per month and a smartphone priced at $499. The Trump family also launched the 'Made in America' T1 Phone. This strategy contrasts with budget MVNOs, prioritizing a premium pricing model.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Review: Evolves as a practical daily driver beyond multitasking
articles.author: Haider Ali Khan
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7, featuring a slim and light design, enhanced durability, and Galaxy AI with One UI 8. The new foldable device has an upgraded processor, improved camera system with a 200 MP main sensor, and enhanced battery life. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 starts at ₹1,74,999 and competes with the recently reviewed Vivo's X Fold 5.

articles.title: In Major Boost, BPP, NASENI Sign Offtake MoU for Made in Nigeria Products
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: BPP and NASENI signed an Offtake MoU to promote and prioritize made in Nigeria products. This initiative aims to boost the local purchase of 14 market-ready products, with a focus on open contracting.

articles.title: LG Revolutionizes Workplace Flexibility With Launch of Smart Monitor Swing in Gulf Region
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched the LG Smart Monitor Swing (model 32U889SA) in the Gulf region. This monitor features a flexible stand, 4K UHD display, touchscreen capabilities, and the webOS smart TV platform and is available for AED 3,699.

articles.title: Six years of MG Hector: The connected car trend starter
articles.author: Mukul Yudhveer Singh
articles.summary: MG Hector launched India's first internet SUV in 2019, priced between ₹12.18 lakh and ₹16.88 lakh. Later, MG expanded the Hector family in July 2020, launching the Hector Plus and the next-generation Hector in January 2023, which includes Level 2 Advanced Driver Assistance Systems and a 14-inch vertical touchscreen.

articles.title: The Only Lipstick Day Lineup That Matters
articles.author: Riddhi Mishra
articles.summary: Various lipsticks are introduced, featuring different shades and formulations. These include lightweight, buildable lipsticks with soft pigments, nourishing lipsticks with classic shades, non-drying liquid mattes, and weightless satin lipsticks. Some lipsticks contain ingredients like mango seed butter, jojoba oil, shea butter, vitamin E, hyaluronic acid, Moroccan oil, lychee extract, cherry extract and avocado oil.

articles.title: Benefit's New Foundation Is So Good, It Makes Our Skin Look Retouched
articles.author: Venus Wong
articles.summary: Benefit Cosmetics has launched a new foundation called "The POREfessional Foundation", priced at £39.50. This foundation promises matte, pore-blurring coverage with a weightless formula, featuring niacinamide to refine texture, hydrate, and improve skin. Editors tested the product, noting its buildable coverage, oil control, blurring effect on pores and imperfections, and long-lasting wear.

articles.title: Amazon Has A Hidden Section For Cult-Fave Products — Here Are 40 Of The Best Things On It
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Amazon features TikTok-viral products like Eos Cashmere Body Oil, which extends the popular lotion line into a body oil form. Additionally, L'Oreal Paris introduced the Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist and the Collagen Daily Face Moisturizer, while Clinique launched Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in PINK Honey. Monday Haircare also launched a Dry Shampoo with keratin, and E.l.f. released Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops.

articles.title: 이주영 국회의원, '노인복지법' 일부개정법률안 대표발의… 노쇠예방 목적
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: Chevrolet (Chevy) has introduced the new 2025 Chevy Silverado. The 2025 Chevy Silverado is finally available.

articles.title: Chrome's AI feature shows if an online shop is legit
articles.summary: Google has introduced "Store Reviews," a new feature in its Chrome browser designed to enhance online shopping safety and efficiency. This AI-powered feature, currently available to US shoppers using the desktop version of Chrome, aggregates user reviews from multiple platforms to provide a comprehensive overview of an online store's reputation based on product quality, pricing, customer service, and return policies. This new feature is part of Google's strategy to integrate AI into the shopping experience.

articles.title: Best Sheet Masks for Skin Care
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Lakmé Skin Solutions introduces a Brightening Sheet Mask enriched with niacinamide for quick glow-ups. Foxtale launches a Nourishing Sheet Mask packed with hyaluronic acid and avocado extracts for instant moisture. Quench presents Cherry Blossom Radiance Sheet Mask infused with Korean cherry blossom and botanical extracts to deliver a natural glow.

articles.title: Brand Faces Backlash Over Alleged Racist Advertising Campaign
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney launched the 'Bathwater' soap, infused with water from her own bathtub. The product sold out rapidly, indicating its impact and public interest in celebrity culture. The launch highlights Sweeney's innovative approach to engaging with her audience.

articles.title: Xiaomi 16 Ultra Ready To Shake Market: Carry Camera With Zoom Optical Continuous Ala DSLR
articles.summary: Xiaomi is preparing to launch its new flagship smartphone, the Xiaomi 16 Ultra, featuring a 200MP sensor with a multi-layer periscope lens system and continuum optical zoom. The device is expected to be powered by the Snapdragon Elite 2 chipset and a large 7,000 to 7,500mAh battery, promising extreme performance and long battery life.

articles.title: Scouted: I Tested the New Magic Wand Vibrator (and It's the Closest I'll Get to Owning a Sports Car)
articles.summary: Vibratex launched a new version of the iconic Magic Wand vibrator, the Magic Wand Waterproof Rechargeable Extra Powerful Wand Massager. This iteration is fully waterproof and boasts a more powerful 7,000 RPM motor. It features four speeds and four vibration patterns, designed for ease of use and versatile stimulation.

articles.title: I Tested the New Magic Wand Vibrator (and It's the Closest I'll Get to Owning a Sports Car)
articles.author: IT’S A VIBE
articles.summary: Vibratex has launched a new waterproof version of the Magic Wand vibrator, an updated model of the iconic clitoral vibrator. The new Magic Wand features a more powerful 7,000 RPM motor and waterproof design, making it versatile for both solo and partner use, including in the bath or shower.

articles.title: Verizon's Free Samsung Z Flip 7: A Complete Guide to the Deal
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Verizon is offering a promotion for a free Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 with new 5G Unlimited plans, requiring a trade-in device and a 36-month commitment. The deal includes benefits like a compact design, Flex Mode, and an advanced camera system and is available both in Verizon stores and online.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G Price, Specifications and Features, Here's Everything To Know About New Lava Smartphone Ahead of Its Sale on August 1, 2025
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava is launching the Blaze Dragon 5G smartphone in India on August 1, 2025. The phone features a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor, a 50MP camera, and is priced starting at INR 8,999 with a launch discount. The sale starts 1st August, 12AM

articles.title: In China, digital humans show future of livestreaming e-commerce
articles.author: Fan Feifei
articles.summary: Baidu Inc's Ernie foundation model powered the livestreaming of Smartisan Technology's founder, Luo Yonghao's, digital avatar, resulting in 13 million views and 55 million yuan in GMV. JD also used a digital human avatar of its founder, Liu Qiangdong, to promote products, generating 20 million views in the first hour and 50 million yuan in sales. These AI-powered digital hosts are utilized to attract consumers, cut operating costs, and improve shopping experience.

articles.title: 32 Products To Help With Embarrassing Problems
articles.author: Jordan Grigsby
articles.summary: I Dew Care introduces a dry shampoo powder designed to add volume and eliminate oily strands, extending time between washes. Nizoral offers an anti-dandruff shampoo utilizing ketoconazole 1% to relieve itchy scalp and fight dandruff. Additionally, Gas-X provides chewable tablets for quick relief from bloating and gas.

articles.title: The Key Challenge to Overcome for Startup Success
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Dropbox was created because Drew Houston was frustrated with emailing files to himself. He needed a faster way to move his files. That pain became Dropbox—and millions of others felt it too.

articles.title: Nintendo News: Draw Inspiration from Mario Paint – Available Now on Nintendo Classics!
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nintendo's 'Mario Paint' game is now available on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch systems through the Super Nintendo Entertainment System - Nintendo Classics library. Players can utilize the Joy-Con controller's mouse functionality on Nintendo Switch 2 or a compatible USB mouse on Nintendo Switch or Nintendo Switch – OLED Model to create digital art, animations, and music. Nintendo Switch 2 players have access to GameChat feature to connect with friends.

articles.title: Best lazy cleaning buys: Best Picks reveals the six cleaning buys to give you a spotless home without any stress
articles.author: Ariana Pezeshki
articles.summary: Scrub Daddy's Damp Duster, available on Amazon Australia, utilizes a unique spongey design to trap dust effectively. Shark offers the PowerDetect Cordless Vacuum, which automatically adjusts suction based on the floor's dirt level, and the MessMaster Portable Wet/Dry Vacuum for quick cleanup of wet or dry messes. ECOVACS presents the DEEBOT N20 Black robot vacuum, designed to autonomously clean homes, while Shark provides the StainStriker Stain and Spot Cleaner for efficient stain removal.

articles.title: The controversy after the appearance in Vogue for the first time of a model created with artificial intelligence
articles.summary: Guess launched a summer campaign featuring AI models created by Seraphinne Vallera. The AI model, featured in a Vogue advertisement, has sparked debate regarding beauty standards and the use of AI in the fashion industry. Seraphinne Vallera believes its technology will complement human models and offer brands a cost-effective alternative.

articles.title: Just 50 Everyday Items That'll Genuinely Change Your Life (No Exaggeration)
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Built introduced "Puff Protein Bars", chocolate-covered marshmallows with 17 grams of protein. Windex launched an outdoor glass cleaner that attaches to a hose. Monday Haircare released Dry Shampoo with a gardenia scent and keratin treatment. Medicube launched "Zero Pore" Pads, Korean skincare with lactic and salicylic acid. Qualify released chocolate brownie protein powder, and PanOxyl introduced Antimicrobial Hydrating Acne Creamy Wash for sensitive skin. Tineco released a 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop with separate tanks for dirty and clean water.

articles.title: 27 Things That Will Make Your Backyard The Place To Be
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: The article presents a range of new outdoor products, including waterproof globe lights, inflatable hot tubs with bubble jets, fast-acting lawn repair formulas, and scent-free mosquito repellers. It also features items like bubble tents, triangular sails for shade, iron firepit tables, and Banzai Bump N' Bounce Body Bumpers for kids, offering diverse options for enhancing outdoor spaces and activities.

articles.title: Comfort-Fit Jewelry for Everyday: She Said Yes Leads Trend
articles.author: She Said Yes
articles.summary: She Said Yes introduced a new design standard emphasizing 'second-skin comfort' in fine jewelry, featuring curved ring walls and hypoallergenic coatings. They also launched a Try At Home Ring Program, allowing customers to sample rings before purchase to ensure fit and style.

articles.title: 36 Products People Are A Little Bit Feral Over
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article presents a range of new products and services. Eos introduces a limited edition Marshmallow lip treatment. Moroccanoil releases a Mini Must-Haves Sampler. Gold Bond launches a firming neck and chest cream. Laneige unveils Neo Blurring Powder. Lottabody presents Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse. Clinique offers a tinted lip balm. Lumify introduces Eye Drops. Catrice launches "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Lego releases botanical "happy plants". Crest presents a painless teeth-whitening pen. The Pink Stuff launches "Sqeezy" sponge set. Burt's Bees offers a sunburn soother. Dreo introduces a bladeless Tower Fan. Elizavecca releases a Olaplex-like repairing hair mask. Joesoef's launches anti-acne sulfur soap. Revlon unveils oil-absorbing volcanic face roller. Dr. Melaxin presents "Peel Shot" for exfoliation.

articles.title: Google rolls out AI mode for Search in UK
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Google is launching its AI mode in the UK, expanding its availability from the US and India. The feature will appear as a tab on the Search results page and in the Google app for Android and iOS.

articles.title: HONOR Launches the All-new HONOR X6c & HONOR X7c
articles.author: Urdu Point
articles.summary: HONOR, an AI device company, has launched the HONOR X6c, a new addition to its X Series, targeting the mid-range market.

articles.title: Google launches AI Mode in the UK amid ‘major shift' in online search
articles.author: Belfast Telegraph
articles.summary: Google has unveiled the UK rollout of a new service.

articles.title: iRobot's Latest Roomba Will Keep Your Carpets Dry
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: iRobot's Roomba Max 705 Combo Robot features a cover designed to prevent the mop from soaking carpets.

articles.title: Heat up your observing with these new products
articles.author: Astronomy
articles.summary: Vixen introduces the Mobile Porta Mount, a new and easily portable alt-azimuth piece in the popular Porta line. This new product aims to enhance the observing experience.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops New Cleaning Tool for Curved Windows (TRO-1385)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor created the ULTIMATE WINDOW CLEANER, a new tool designed to clean curved windows and hard-to-reach glass areas on vehicles like fire trucks, motor homes, and transport trucks. The design aims to eliminate struggles and the need to climb ladders.

articles.title: Longboat Mobility Leverages Lucas AI Video Creator To Launch Campaign 3 Months Ahead of Schedule
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Longboat Mobility partnered with Idomoo. They leveraged AI. The AI enabled them to launch a high-quality explainer video for customers three months ahead of schedule.

articles.title: This Shark Robo Vac Uses AI, and Now It's Half Off
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: The Shark AI Ultra robot vacuum is available with significant discounts.
